headline.main: Her Poetry, Not Her Death, Is Her Triumph; Sylvia, Plath took her life in 1963. Yet Tuesday her words will be spoken on a New York stage.

abstract: article on poetry of Sylvia Plath on occasion of presentation of her writings by Royal Shakespeare Co at Bklyn Academy; drawing (L)
snippet: GREAT BRITAIN'S Royal Shakespeare Company is bringing an evening of Sylvia Plath to the Brooklyn Academy. Her work inclding "Three Women," the only verse play she ever wrote, is to be in repertory with shakespeare's "Richard II" starting Tuesday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: REVIEWS AND OTHER DATA ON SPECIFIC PRODUCTIONS
